release.body:
## What's Changed
* Update to support using v3 by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-secrets/pull/5


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-secrets/compare/0.2.0...0.3.0

What's Changed

  • Update to support using v3 by @cspray in #5

Full Changelog: 0.2.0...0.3.0

payload.description: An Annotated Container parameter store for storing sensitive configuration values

release.body:
## What's Changed
* Allow installation of psalm 6, Drop PHP 8.0 support by @DanielBadura in https://github.com/cspray/phinal/pull/4

## New Contributors
* @DanielBadura made their first contribution in https://github.com/cspray/phinal/pull/4

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/phinal/compare/2.0.0...2.1.0
release.short_description_html:
What's Changed

  • Allow installation of psalm 6, Drop PHP 8.0 support by @DanielBadura in #4

New Contributors

  • @DanielBadura made their first contribution in #4

Full Changelog: 2.0.0...2.1.0

release.body:
## What's Changed
* Feature/profiles aware store by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-secrets/pull/1
* Expect array of profiles instead of ActiveProfiles type by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-secrets/pull/2
* Add sources to secrets parameter store by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-secrets/pull/3
* Allow for many parameter stores to be created by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-secrets/pull/4

## New Contributors
* @cspray made their first contribution in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-secrets/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container-secrets/compare/0.1.0...0.2.0
release.short_description_html:
What's Changed

  • Feature/profiles aware store by @cspray in #1
  • Expect array of profiles instead of ActiveProfiles type by @cspray in #2
  • Add sources to secrets parameter store by @cspray in #3
  • Allow …
